item.description:
What is Agenda 21? Where did it come from? Why it is important to property owners and patriots in New Hampshire and around the country?

What is “Sustainable Development” and what are the objectives of this program?

Rosa Koire, author of “Behind the Green Mask: Agenda 2...1” is coming to New Hampshire! This is your opportunity to find out what is happening in the name of ‘sustainable development’.

• National Expert on Sustainable Development and its impact on the loss of property rights.
• Forensic commercial Real Estate appraiser who specializes in eminent domain valuation.
• Twenty-eight year career as California expert witness on land use, now exposing the impacts of Sustainable Development on private property rights and individual liberty.

Rosa will be in New Hampshire from June 23rd – 25th and will be speaking on these issues.

This event is being sponsored by Jack Kimball and the Granite State Liberty PAC.

Sat. June 23, 2-5:00 PM at Southern NH Univ. 2500 N. River Rd., Manchester
item.name: Behind the Green Mask~AGENDA 21 (Manch)
